SEARCH
Module CODEX
Package CODEX.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
CODEX.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameControllerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class GameController extends UnicastRemoteObject implements GameControllerInterface
This class is the controller of a game. It contains all the methods which can be invoked during a match.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController() throws RemoteException
      Class constructor, initialises lastRounds and lastDrawingRounds to 10 (improbable value)
      Throws:
      RemoteException - when there's a problem in the communication of GameController object

  • Method Details

    • createGame

      public void createGame(List<Player> gamePlayers)
      This method creates the Game that will be managed by GameController
      Parameters:
      gamePlayers - is the List of players that will be in the Game

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player) throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      This method adds a player to the waiting ones in the lobby (gamePlayers)
      Parameters:
      player - is the one player added to the lobby
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the of players is exceeded

    • checkNPlayers

      public void checkNPlayers()
      This method is invoked when we need to check how many players there are in the game. If the number of players inside is correct, then it starts the game
      Specified by:
      checkNPlayers in interface GameControllerInterface

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      This method starts the game. The game state is set to STARTED. 2 objective cards are given to each player, and he will need to choose one of these. Then the market is completed and each player receives 3 cards (2 resource cards and 1 gold card). INTERNAL USE METHOD

    • playBaseCard

      public void playBaseCard(String nickname, PlayableCard baseCard, boolean orientation)
      This method let the Player place the baseCard (in the middle of the table) and, if all the players have placed their baseCard, it let the Game finish the set-up phase giving the last necessary cards
      Specified by:
      playBaseCard in interface GameControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player who plays the card
      baseCard - the base card played
      orientation - of the played card

    • checkBaseCardPlayed

      public void checkBaseCardPlayed()
      This method checks if all the players have played their base card. If they all did, then it gives the initial cards for the starting of the match.
      Specified by:
      checkBaseCardPlayed in interface GameControllerInterface

    • playCard

      public void playCard(String nickname, PlayableCard selectedCard, Coordinates position, boolean orientation) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method "plays" the card selected by the Player in his own Board
      Specified by:
      playCard in interface GameControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname of the Player that wants to play a card
      selectedCard - the Card the Player wants to play
      position - the position where the Player wants to play the Card
      orientation - the side on which the Player wants to play the Card
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is an error in playing the card

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(String nickname, PlayableCard selectedCard)
      This method allows the currentPlayer to draw a card from the decks or from the unveiled ones
      Specified by:
      drawCard in interface GameControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player who is going to draw the card
      selectedCard - is the Card the Players wants to draw

    • disconnection

      public void disconnection()
      This method is used when the server detects a disconnection, so it removes all the observers and removes the gameController of the match where the disconnection happened
